mapper.select:
WITH RANK AS ( SELECT A.차종 AS carProps, A.품명 AS groupProps, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY A.차종, REPLACE(A.품명, '_', ' ') ORDER BY A.등록일 DESC) AS RN FROM TB_PDM_ORDER_ForWeeks A
등록일 >= DATEADD(MONTH , -2, (SELECT MAX(등록일) FROM TB_PDM_ORDER_ForWeeks)) AND
차종 IN
#{carProp}
AND (대응지 LIKE N'%위해%' OR 대응지 LIKE N'%덕주%' OR 대응지 LIKE N'%베트남%' OR 대응지 LIKE N'%비나%')
GROUP BY A.차종, A.품명, A.등록일 ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY carProps, groupProps) AS seq, carProps, groupProps FROM RANK WHERE RN = 1
